parameters.name: filter[phone_number][starts_with]
parameters.description: Filter numbers starting with a pattern (excludes NDC if used with `national_destination_code` filter).

generic.summary: Find numbers starting with the pattern. Can be numbers or letters e.g '8226' or 'TACO'

parameters.name: filter[phone_number][ends_with]
parameters.description: Filter numbers ending with a pattern (excludes NDC if used with `national_destination_code` filter).

generic.summary: Find numbers ending with the pattern. Can be numbers or letters e.g '8226' or 'TACO'

parameters.name: filter[phone_number][contains]
parameters.description: Filter numbers containing a pattern (excludes NDC if used with `national_destination_code` filter).

generic.summary: Find numbers that contain the pattern. Can be numbers or letters e.g '8226' or 'TACO'

parameters.name: filter[administrative_area]
parameters.description: Find numbers in a particular US state or CA province.

generic.summary: Must use 2 letter ISO alpha-2 country code

parameters.name: filter[national_destination_code]
parameters.description: Filter by the national destination code of the number.

parameters.name: filter[rate_center]
parameters.description: Filter phone numbers by rate center. This filter is only applicable to USA and Canada numbers.

parameters.name: filter[phone_number_type]
parameters.description: Filter phone numbers by number type.

parameters.name: filter[features]
parameters.description: Filter phone numbers with specific features.

generic.summary: This filter will also accept a list of features

parameters.name: filter[best_effort]
parameters.description: Filter to determine if best effort results should be included. Only available in USA/CANADA.

generic.summary: If no numbers are found in specified area, try return numbers from a similar location.

parameters.name: filter[quickship]
parameters.description: Filter to exclude phone numbers that need additional time after to purchase to activate. Only applicable for +1 toll_free numbers.

parameters.name: filter[reservable]
parameters.description: Filter to ensure only numbers that can be reserved are included in the results.

parameters.name: filter[exclude_held_numbers]
parameters.description: Filter to exclude phone numbers that are currently on hold/reserved for your account.
